scripts.build: if [ "$VERCEL" = "1" ]; then bun run build:vercel; else bun run build:local; fi
scripts.build:local: bun run env:dev bunx prisma migrate deploy && bunx prisma generate && next build
scripts.build:static: rm -rf .next out && NEXT_PUBLIC_STATIC_EXPORT=true NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_API=true next build && mkdir -p out && cp -r public/* out/ && cp index.html out/
scripts.gh-pages: rm -rf out && mkdir -p out && cp -r public/* out/ && cp index.html out/ && ls -la out && node scripts/deploy-gh-pages.js
scripts.db:migrate: bun run env:dev bunx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: bun run env:prod bunx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:reset: bun run env:dev bunx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:reset:prod: bun run env:prod bunx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:push: bun run env:dev bunx prisma db push
scripts.db:push:prod: bun run env:prod bunx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: bun run env:dev bunx prisma db seed
